q.t: I only ___(meet) her six months ago.
Sometimes it ___(be) hard, especially in winter when the weather was bad.
I ___(write) the wrong thing. Can I use your eraser?
--___ you ___(use) to take a bus to school? --Yes, but now I usually go to scchool on foot.
So glad to see you back! How long ___ you ___(stay) there?
